title: Missing Patch Files
body: Whenever I decide to play LoL (usually only during 6~8 or 10~3) almost always during the loading screen, a good 30 seconds in, there is an issue where saying that some patch files are missing or something, and it just spontaneosly happens. The worst thing is that once it finishes, it can either happen again when I try to connect if they hadn't remade by then, but it just makes things like Ranked and even Normals unplayable. I end up being punished, and I'm sitting on 20 minutes of leaverbuster. For five games. Please, I need a solution.

replies.body: It sounds like an update didn't go well and may have become corrupt.  If this is on the updated client, you may need to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)and refresh your client back to the legacy version.  You can then re-download the updated client from there.  If you are still on the legacy, then you can use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a fresh repair.  I recommend testing it out in custom games to prevent any further penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions.
